person.persName: John Henderson, Jr. (Campbell County riverboat pilot and farmer)

body.p: Campbell County, Kentucky, riverboat pilot and farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Henderson, Sr. and Abigail Henderson. Married to August Henderson. Father of Elizabeth Byrd, Helen Byrd, Josephine Byrd, Freda A. Byrd, Amanda Byrd, John Byrd, and Andrew Byrd. Riverboat pilot in Campbell County in 1860. Farmer in Campbell County in 1863.
